document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">long </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">storm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">Rainbow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">rose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">late </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">morn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Clouds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">listless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">Elephants </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">Horizons </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">straggled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Birds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">rose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">smiling, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">nests </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">gales </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">indeed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">done </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Alas, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">how </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">heedless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">eyes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">shone! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">quiet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">nonchalance </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">death </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Daybreak </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">bestir </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">slow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Archangel's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">syllables </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">awaken </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: On this long storm the rainbow rose
